data.message: I'm having a issue with my account, on the Facebook app (for Android) friend requests are showing on the notifications icon and Marketplace icon has gone, I've reported this several times and I'm not getting the help that I needed to solve this problem, everyone on my country have those features and i guess that i'm the only one who's getting that issue, please I need an answer because i want the new features and i'm not getting them, thank you and have a nice day.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Cristián. Please make sure you have the latest version of the app installed. If you do, sit tight while our team reviews the situation. We appreciate your patience. -Jessica

Thanks for answering me, i have the latest version of the Facebook app (automatic updates are on). I will wait as long as the Facebook team solves my issue, I forgot to mention that my device is Samsung Galaxy Note 2. Thank you and i'll wait for the problem to be solved soon as possible.
